titleStmt.title: A new engagement, or, Manifesto wherein is declared the sence and resolution of many thousands of well-affected people in and about London, and some adjacent counties (viz. Kent, Hartford, Buckingham, and Berks, &c.) who seeing all present authorities to be perverted from their naturall end, the peoples safety, are necessitated to invite all faithfull Englishmen to put themselves into a posture of defending their own and countries liberties, and to labour for a speedy establishment of a just and equall government. Published at the desire of some honest and eminent persons, for the satisfaction of all that seek not the advancement of parties and factions, but desire the peace and prosperitie of the nation.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
